title: kamala malaridazh
sahitya:
kamala malaridazh pazhikkum iruvizhigaL kazhal paNiyum anbargaL
 kavalai ara aruL mazhai pozhiyum mukhilE kalyANa guNa nidhi  


anupallavi

  kamala malar vaLar tiruvai mArbinil kAdaluDan vaitta tirumAl viri


caraNam    shankha cakramoD-abhayamum gadaiyum taangum nAngu bhujangaLum pada
pankajamum pItAmbaramum uyar paccai mughiluDal azagum vikasita
